item.title: Gigabit Wireless For TDM and IP Transport
item.description:
XO Communications uses BridgeWave Communications’ FlexPort link to provide gigabit bandwidth services to buildings without a fiber connection. This wireless technology eliminates the need for physical cables and offers high-bandwidth connectivity through the air. While copper cables and microwave wireless are suitable for moderate bandwidth, fixed wireless systems using millimeter wave transmissions can deliver fiber-like performance without physical fiber optic cables. Laser-based solutions are also available for shorter distances, but BridgeWave excels in connecting networks over several miles...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/gigabit-wireless-for-tdm-and-ip-transport/
